main event: A witness spotted a bright white light in the sky that moved at high speed and then disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white light that appeared solid, not fuzzy or transparent.
The object was estimated to be about 1/3 the size of the full moon when viewed through a match stick held at arm's length.
The object suddenly sped up and then disappeared completely from view.
No sound was reported from the object.
The witness was outside when the sighting occurred.
